title: Riot please acknowledge Kalista bug
body: Ok so with the changes with kalista it seems like the passive leap has been effected. once i get a runaans and a Shiv the jumping window is so tiny that the only way i can jump effectively is if i use attack move, and at this point i'm still a good bit attack speed off the max of 2.5. If i build anymore attack speed after that the passive becomes impossible to use effectively. I have over 70 games with the champion i would just like to know if this change in difficulty was intended.

replies.body: Same here too. I died to bots because of it rofl.
